title: Loud unknown voice says: "Returning to Base"
body: I was watching my two friends play league of legends in spectator mode and suddenly heard a very feminine robot voice say "Returning to Base" when on of them was recalling. Is this a bug?

replies.body:
Update: it happened again: 

This time the voice said: "Withdrawing"  when volibear was recalling.
lol I heard this in the LCS and I was like "wtf what was that"
